channel.title: 525 run.bat need help!
channel.description:
Sooooooooooo, I'm running Windows 7 64bit and I'm getting this error whenever I run these files. I changed my JDK directory to (program files (x86)).
Here's what my runserver.BAT looks like:
@echo off title Z508 cd ../build "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\java.exe" net/com/codeusa/Server 43594 pause
And here's the error I'm getting:
The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/com/codeusa/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.com.codeusa.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java: 202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.j ava:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:3 07) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launche r.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:2 48) Could not find the main class: net/com/codeusa/Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
Same thing with compiler.BAT:
Here's what my compiler.BAT looks like:
@echo off title compile cd ../src echo Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java pause
And here's the error I'm getting:
The system cannot find the path specified. Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java javac: file not found: .\net\com\codeusa\Engine.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
Any help would be great I'm running a 508/525 server.

item.title: 525 run.bat need help!
item.dc:creator: @09jblatz 09jblatz
item.description:
@09jblatz wrote:

Sooooooooooo, I’m running Windows 7 64bit and I’m getting this error whenever I run these files. I changed my JDK directory to (program files (x86)).

Here’s what my runserver.BAT looks like:

@echo off
title Z508
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\java.exe” net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

And here’s the error I’m getting:

The system cannot find the path specified.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/com/codeusa/Server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.com.codeusa.Server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java: 202)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.j ava:190)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:3 07)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launche r.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:2 48)
Could not find the main class: net/com/codeusa/Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Same thing with compiler.BAT:

Here’s what my compiler.BAT looks like:

@echo off
title compile
cd …/src
echo Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
pause

And here’s the error I’m getting:

The system cannot find the path specified.
Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
javac: file not found: .\net\com\codeusa\Engine.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

Any help would be great I’m running a 508/525 server.

Read full topic
